Name: Project Aeronaut
About the game: Take to the skies in Project Aeronaut, a made-for-VR game that puts you in the virtual shoes of a superhero. Use your hand-mounted thrusters to fly across the battlefield in an intuitive style of VR movement that has never been seen before. Wield an arsenal of wrist-mounted weaponry to battle swarms of deadly robots, tanks, and drones across multiple modes. -Smoothly transition from flight to multiple types of ground-based movement, including Teleport, Armswinger, and Touchpad locomotion. -Face the hordes in the Arena or train for accuracy and speed at the Time Trials. -Use your blaster, missiles and lasers to clear the skies. -Boost, hover, and dodge through the air in a flying super suit. -Shoot down missiles and evade flak clouds to defend your objective. -Master the skies to become a true Aeronaut!
